message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - edu.tum.cup2.generator.items.*.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - edu.tum.cup2.generator.states.*.
Abbreviation in name 'LALR1AutomatonFactory' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'newDFAStates' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'{' at column 5 should be on the previous line.
